Answer:
<<<api>>>: StringTokenizer.nextToken
<<<code>>>: StringTokenizer st = new StringTokenizer(bo.readLine());int k = 0;while (st.hasMoreTokens()) {    a[k++] = Integer.parseInt(st.nextToken());}//This line is giving exception.for (int j = 0; j < k; j++) {          int temp = a[j];   int temp1 = a[j + 1];   int num = temp + temp1;
<<<explanation>>>: The StringTokenizer class is used to break a string into tokens. The nextToken() method returns the next token from the string passed as an argument.
